Steps.Description: Step 1: Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock
Step 2a: If opponent stays, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2b: If opponent switches out into Skarmory, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill Leafeon. Switch into Excadrill then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Stealth Rock
Step 2a: If opponent stays, let it die then send in the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If opponent switches out into Rhyperior, switch into Chandelure then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Stealth Rock
Step 2a: If opponent stays, switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Send out Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Substeps.Description: Step 2b.a: If opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch into Blissey then switch into Chandelure. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 1: Trick
Step 2a: If opponent stays, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If opponent switches out into Rhyperior, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Switch to Blissey Stealth Rock
Step 2a: If opponent stays, switch to Poliwrath and use Belly Drum. Use Drain Punch to kill.

Substeps.Description: Step 2a.a: If opponent sends out Jolteon, let Poliwrath die then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2a.b: If opponent switches out into Nidoqueen, switch to Poliwrath then switch to Metagross and use Trick.  Switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 2b: If opponent switches to Heracross, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Trick then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Trick then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch into Poliwrath then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
Trick then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Trick
Step 2a: If opponent switches into Leafeon, switch into Chandelure Flamethrower. Switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If opponent switches out into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Trick
Step 2a: If opponent stays, use Stealth Rock

Substeps.Description: Step 2a.a: If opponent uses Pursuit, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2a.b: If opponent switches out into Sandslash, switch into Metagross then switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Softboiled then switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 2b: If opponent switches into Sandslash, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Substeps.Description: Step 2b.a: If vs. Sandslash, use another X.Speed

Steps.Description: Step 2c: If opponent switches into Slowbro, Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Trick then use Stealth Rock. Switch into Blissey and use Trick. SWitch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Substeps.Description: If opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch into Blissey then switch into Chandelure. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 1: Trick
Step 2a: If opponent uses Hydro Pump, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
Step 2b: If opponent uses Scald, use Stealth Rock. Switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Step 1: Trick
Step 2a: If opponent uses Earthquake, use Stealth Rock

Substeps.Description: Step 2a.a: If opponent stays, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Step 2a.b: If opponent swaps out into Magnezone comes out, use Earthquake to kill. Let Metagross die and switch to the second one and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 2b: If opponent uses Leech Seed, use Stealth Rock. Switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep

Substeps.Description: Step 2b.a: If opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep

Steps.Description: Step 2c: If opponent switches out into Sandslash, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep

Substeps.Description: Step 2c.a: If opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch into Poliwrath then switch back into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
